1567150.name: Black Legend Soundtrack
1567150.description:
Immerse yourself into the world of Black Legend with the incredible original soundtrack composed by Vadim Krakhmal. Wander through the streets of Grant, feel the mysterious tension and lose yourself in heroic battles.
The Black Legend original soundtrack includes nineteen tracks for your listening pleasure. All tracks are provided in MP3 (320 kbps) and lossless FLAC format.
